original_title: Price of milk tea reduced to Rs. 90 from Monday (27) – All Ceylon Restaurant Owners Association
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – The price of a cup of milk tea will be reduced to Rs. 90 from Monday (27), according to the All Ceylon Restaurant Owners Association.
Unions strike against attempts to privatize the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation
Sri Lanka to receive USD 7 billion loan from two foreign banks
